hero.typewriter.name: Ismatov O'lmasjon
about.title: About me
about.p1: I always loved to create complicated things with many details. I have graphic design skills and an understanding of digital aesthetics.
about.p2: I love programming, and of course, love design. Persevering and multitasking, with analytical thinking and an engineering mindset.
about.p3: I like to educate myself, open to cutting-edge technologies and challenges. Perfect team player with a versatile personality and a sense of humor.
about.p4: I want to continue my career as a Front-end web developer at creative company to become a part of the development team.
about.p5: I'm always evolving and adding new programming languages, frameworks, and tools to my tech stack. Open for any activities, meetings, meetups and work experiments.
